page.title: 19HOW THINGS GET TO FOXTON
page.content:
We have no Railway line in our block so everything comes to us by road or canal.Here are just a few things that arrive.
BUS _ This calls in to Gartree and then Foxton on its way to Leicester.
Milk man_ He calls early in the morning and delivers milk,eggs,bread and fruit juice.
POSTMAN _He calls to deliver the mail in the morning and twice a day he comes out to empty the pillar box at Gartree and the one at Foxton where we post our letters. COALMAN _He calls and delivers coal in 55k.g.sacks for our fires cost Â£6.30 Library_A mobile library comes on every other Wednesday from Market Harborough.
